entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
